meanings.definition: Make improvements to (a text or piece of writing)
meanings.sent1: She emends her essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He always emends his stories before sharing them.
meanings.sent3: The student emends her paper to impress her teacher.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled craftsman, he emends his writing until it shines.
meanings.sent5: With each edit, she emends her work to perfection.

meanings.definition: Correct or revise (a mistake or error)
meanings.sent1: He quickly emends the spelling mistake in his report.
meanings.sent2: The teacher emends the wrong answer on the test.
meanings.sent3: In a rush, she emends the error in her calculations.
meanings.sent4: Just like magic, he emends the mistake and saves the day.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, she emends the error and moves on.
